subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Brad Wanamaker scored 24 points, Ashton Gibbs had 22 and No. 5 Pittsburgh withstood an upset scare in the first N.C.A.A. Division I game of the season.
snippet: Brad Wanamaker scored 24 points, Ashton Gibbs had 22 and No. 5 Pittsburgh withstood an upset scare in the first N.C.A.A. Division I game of the season.
